channel.title: Comments on: This Week in Genesis (27 May 2016)
channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:

No problem, happy to share great work!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to nicola tweed.

No problem, happy to share great work!

item.title: By: Marcus Tibesar
item.dc:creator: Marcus Tibesar
item.description:
I configured many Bloxes when creating this blog for the U.S. Army. One of the most useful plugins I've used in sometime. @bloxwp
https://tcmmobilenews.org
item.content:encoded:
I configured many Bloxes when creating this blog for the U.S. Army. One of the most useful plugins I’ve used in sometime. @bloxwp

https://tcmmobilenews.org

item.title: By: Ren Ventura
item.dc:creator: Ren Ventura
item.description:
Hey, Nick. Appreciate the mention, as always!
If anyone would like to beta test my new plugin, feel free to hit me up on Twitter. I'm still looking for a couple testers.
item.content:encoded:
Hey, Nick. Appreciate the mention, as always!

If anyone would like to beta test my new plugin, feel free to hit me up on Twitter. I’m still looking for a couple testers.

item.title: By: nicola tweed
item.dc:creator: nicola tweed
item.description: Exciting time, two weeks in a row! So glad my hard work is paying off, just love working with the Genesis platform.
item.content:encoded: Exciting time, two weeks in a row! So glad my hard work is paying off, just love working with the Genesis platform.

item.title: By: Nick Davis

Thanks Marcy, that really means a lot.

item.title: By: Ryan Townley
item.dc:creator: Ryan Townley
item.description: Thanks as always, Nick, for the mention!
item.content:encoded: Thanks as always, Nick, for the mention!

item.title: By: Marcy Diaz
item.dc:creator: Marcy Diaz
item.description:
Thank you for mentioning the new Agent Focused Pro theme this week, and my part with it too. I appreciate you and your generosity.
It's wonderful and uplifting the way you put everything together each week, so that we always know who has something new and what's happening. It's like a mini celebration, coming here to read each week.
item.content:encoded:
Thank you for mentioning the new Agent Focused Pro theme this week, and my part with it too. I appreciate you and your generosity.

It’s wonderful and uplifting the way you put everything together each week, so that we always know who has something new and what’s happening. It’s like a mini celebration, coming here to read each week.
